message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to you is $1000000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1000000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go down to $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $1100000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my original asking price.

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $1100000. I'm willing to compromise and offer $1050000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and your original asking price.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your hesitation, but I'm still not willing to go down to $1050000. I'm willing to make another concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1080000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my original asking price. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
